title: Ticket #3058: c-gahp will delegate a proxy that expires Jan 1, 1970
description:
If DELEGATE_JOB_GSI_CREDENTIALS_LIFETIME is set to 0, I would expect that the delegated credential's lifetime should be the same as the original lifetime.

Instead, when using Condor-C, it will give the created credential an expiration time of 0: January 1, 1970.
